Class Material

  • Object

  • public class Material
extends Object
    A class the holds the surface properties of an object.
    Author:
    Jacob

    • Field Detail

      • defaultMaterial

        public static final Material defaultMaterial
        A default Material object where all constants are equal to 1.0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Material

        public Material(double epsilon,
                double dynamicFric,
                double staticFric)
        Parameters:
        epsilon - This is the bounciness of the body. A epsilon of 79 will result in an approximately elastic collision between this body and another body if that other body is fixed and has an epsilon of 1.0.
        dynamicFric - This is how difficult it is to get the body to slide.
        staticFric - This is how difficult it is to get the body sliding from rest

    • Method Detail

      • getEpsilon

        public double getEpsilon()
        Returns:
        The double that represents the bounciness of the body.

      • getDynamicFric

        public double getDynamicFric()
        Returns:
        A double that represents how difficult it is to get the body to slide.

      • getStaticFric

        public double getStaticFric()
        Returns:
        A double that represents how difficult it is to get the body sliding from rest
